org.apache.flink.configuration

类 JobManagerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.configuration.JobManagerOptions

  • @PublicEvolving
public class JobManagerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration options for the JobManager.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ADDRESS
      The config parameter defining the network address to connect to for communication with the job manager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ARCHIVE_DIR
      The location where the JobManager stores the archives of completed jobs.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> EXECUTION_FAILOVER_STRATEGY
      The maximum number of prior execution attempts kept in history.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> JOB_MANAGER_HEAP_MEMORY
      JVM heap size (in megabytes) for the JobManager
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> MAX_ATTEMPTS_HISTORY_SIZE
      The maximum number of prior execution attempts kept in history.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> PORT
      The config parameter defining the network port to connect to for communication with the job manager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> RESOURCE_MANAGER_RECONNECT_INTERVAL
      This option specifies the interval in order to trigger a resource manager reconnection if the connection to the resource manager has been lost.

    • 字段详细资料

      • ADDRESS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ADDRESS
        The config parameter defining the network address to connect to for communication with the job manager.

        This value is only interpreted in setups where a single JobManager with static name or address exists (simple standalone setups, or container setups with dynamic service name resolution). It is not used in many high-availability setups, when a leader-election service (like ZooKeeper) is used to elect and discover the JobManager leader from potentially multiple standby JobManagers.

      • PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> PORT
        The config parameter defining the network port to connect to for communication with the job manager.

        Like ADDRESS, this value is only interpreted in setups where a single JobManager with static name/address and port exists (simple standalone setups, or container setups with dynamic service name resolution). This config option is not used in many high-availability setups, when a leader-election service (like ZooKeeper) is used to elect and discover the JobManager leader from potentially multiple standby JobManagers.

      • JOB_MANAGER_HEAP_MEMORY

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> JOB_MANAGER_HEAP_MEMORY
        JVM heap size (in megabytes) for the JobManager

      • MAX_ATTEMPTS_HISTORY_SIZE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> MAX_ATTEMPTS_HISTORY_SIZE
        The maximum number of prior execution attempts kept in history.

      • EXECUTION_FAILOVER_STRATEGY

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> EXECUTION_FAILOVER_STRATEGY
        The maximum number of prior execution attempts kept in history.

      • RESOURCE_MANAGER_RECONNECT_INTERVAL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Long> RESOURCE_MANAGER_RECONNECT_INTERVAL
        This option specifies the interval in order to trigger a resource manager reconnection if the connection to the resource manager has been lost. This option is only intended for internal use.

      • ARCHIVE_DIR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> ARCHIVE_DIR
        The location where the JobManager stores the archives of completed jobs.
